mapper.select: select count(s.ID) num, substr(s.VEHICLENO,1,2) carNum from jq_tvpm_vehiclelog_part s where s.VCODE = #{vcode} and substr(s.ACCESSDATE,1,10) = #{day} group by substr(s.ACCESSDATE,1,10),CARNUM,s.VCODE ORDER BY num desc

select count(s.ID) num, PROVINCE ,CITY as carNum from jq_tvpm_vehiclelog_part s where s.VCODE = #{vcode} AND city IS NOT NULL AND province IS NOT NULL and (s.ACCESSDATE BETWEEN #{beginDay} AND #{endDay}) group by CARNUM ORDER BY num desc LIMIT 100

SELECT COUNT(s.ID) num, PROVINCE ,CITY as carNum FROM jq_tvpm_vehiclelog_part s WHERE s.VCODE = #{vcode} AND city IS NOT NULL AND province IS NOT NULL AND (s.ACCESSDATE BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}) GROUP BY CARNUM ORDER BY num DESC

select count(s.ID) num, substr(s.VEHICLENO,1,2) carNum from jq_tvpm_vehiclelog_part s where s.VCODE = #{vcode} and DATE_FORMAT(s.ACCESSDATE,'%Y') = #{year} group by substr(s.ACCESSDATE,1,4),CARNUM,VCODE ORDER BY num desc

select count(s.ID) num, PROVINCE ,CITY as carNum from jq_tvpm_vehiclelog_part s where s.VCODE = #{vcode} AND city IS NOT NULL AND province IS NOT NULL and (s.ACCESSDATE BETWEEN #{beginYear} AND #{endYear}) group by CARNUM ORDER BY num desc

select count(s.ID) num, PROVINCE ,CITY as carNum from jq_tvpm_vehiclelog_part s where s.VCODE = #{vcode} AND city IS NOT NULL AND province IS NOT NULL and (s.ACCESSDATE BETWEEN #{startTime} and #{endTime}) group by CARNUM ORDER BY num desc
SELECT j.administrative_division AS region FROM jq_scenic_areas AS j WHERE vcode =#{vcode} AND STATUS = 1 AND j.ADMINISTRATIVE_DIVISION IS NOT NULL LIMIT 1
